body.name: MAM Air Matte Pacifiers, for Sensitive Skin, 6+ Months, Best Pacifier for Breastfed Babies, Girl Pacifiers, 6-16, 4 Count
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 20 hrs 58 mins
features: DESIGNED FOR BABIES WITH SENSITIVE SKIN: Pacifier design allows maximum airflow to the face so sensitive skin can breathe.
HIGH QUALITY: Approved by 94% of babies*, our 100% BPA & BPS free silicone pacifiers meet or exceed US safety standards and are extremely durable while being soft and flexible for your baby's comfort

ALWAYS RIGHT-SIDE UP: Symmetrical nipple so pacifier can never be inserted the wrong way. Other pacifiers (NUK pacifier, Dr Browns pacifier, Playtex pacifier) may require constant manual adjustment by caregivers.

DESIGNED TO PREVENT SKIN IRRITATION: MAM Pacifiers feature large air holes to allow air to reach baby’s skin to reduce irritation. Curved shield and innovative bumps on inner shield surface prevent pacifier from laying completely flush to baby’s face, keeping drool from becoming trapped against skin.
PREMIUM EUROPEAN MATERIALS: Made in Europe from high quality, 100% baby safe BPA & BPS free materials. MAM pacifiers and all MAM products meet or exceed both U.S. & European safety standards.
body.description: The MAM Air Pacifier has a shield that is specially designed for babies 6-16+ months with sensitive skin. The extra wide air holes allow plenty of circulation around your baby's mouth and even allow you to peek at their little smile. All MAM pacifiers for baby feature our trademarked SkinSoft silicone pacifier nipples that feel like mom and help babies transition from breast to pacifier. In fact, market research showed that MAM nipples are easily accepted by babies of all ages, with 94% nipple acceptance among babies tested*. The textured breastfeed pacifier nipple stays easily in baby's mouth and is just the right size for your girl and boy baby 6-16 months so their growing teeth, palate, and jaw will be safe. Additionally, the symmetrical orthodontic nipple shape means you won't have to worry about uneven pressure or fussing to turn the pacifier "right side up". *Market research 2010-2020, tested with 1,572 babies

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Parenting is hard. We make stuff to make it easier. MAM knows that being a parent is not always easy, so we make products that are smart and simple to use. For over 45 years we've been obsessed with making innovative pacifiers, bottles, cups, teethers, and toothbrushes, providing babies with optimal care at all stages. MAM Air Matte Orthodontic Pacifier 4 Air Matte Pacifiers for Sensitive Skin, 6-16 Months MAM's BPA/BPS-free Air Pacifiers have been developed by pediatric dentists and developmental psychologists to provide maximum comfort and style for babies ages 6+ months*. MAM’s pacifiers combine technological innovation and trendsetting design to help give babies a healthy start in life. *Developed in conjunction with the International Children’s Medical Research Society SkinSoft silicone nipple feels soft and familiar like mom Anti-slip texture helps nipple stay comfortably in baby’s mouth Curved shield allows the pacifier to sit comfortably on baby’s face Extra large shield openings allow air to circulate and baby’s skin to breathe

Extra large air holes in shield allow baby's skin to breathe Symmetrical nipple promotes healthy oral development by reducing pressure on incoming teeth SkinSoft silicone nipple offers a familiar feel

MAM Perfect Pacifier MAM Air Night Pacifier MAM Air Matte Pacifiers, 4-Pack, 6+M, Girl MAM Original Pacifier MAM Original Night Pacifier 6+ Nipple Size ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ SkinSoft Textured Silicone Nipple ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Textured Shield (Reduces Skin Irritation) ✓ ✓ Extra Air Exposure (For Sensitive Skin) ✓ ✓ Extra Thin & Flexible Orthodontic Nipple ✓ Quantity 2 2 4 2 2 Includes Self-Sterilizing Box ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Glows in the Dark ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great every day pacifier for picky babies
reviews.reviewText: These are great for picky babies. My son will only use mam pacifiers. I love that these have big holes on the sides to allow for better airflow & it’s good for his sensitive skin too

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these pacifiers!
reviews.reviewText: My baby loves these pacifiers. They work for him! The matte colors are appealing as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My son's favorite
reviews.reviewText: My son has been a binky baby from the beginning and he has always chosen the Mam brand binkies. They are easy to clean, easy to put a binky clip on, and recommended by our pediatric dentist! Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect sizing up!
reviews.reviewText: Took my 7 month old all but 2 tries with the new size. He’s sleeping peacefully now with one of them in his mouth! Love this brand of pacifiers!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Only pacifiers we use!
reviews.reviewText: These have been both of my kid's favorite pacifier. They are easy to put the dishwasher for cleaning and great if your kids have sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars By far our favorite
reviews.reviewText: I personally feel that these are the best style pacifier out there. The nipple shape is great and a favorite of all my kids (and we tried every available style on the market to find that out). This shield is awesome because it minimizes the chance of any skin irritation around the mouth and also is less intrusive looking. You see more adorable face and less pacifier. Also very easy for the kiddos to hold in their hand.Hold up well over time, handy sterilization case / carrying case, cute designs... no complaints here other than this style can e tricky to locate in stores so I always ordered extra to have on hand just in case.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Got Rid of Rash
reviews.reviewText: Love these! My baby will only use Mam pacifiers but the ones we were using were causing a rash around her chin and mouth. Thankfully I found that Mam makes these pacifiers. After 24 hours of using these, my baby’s rash cleared up completely and she’s been using them for a couple months now and the rash hasn’t come back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Breastfed baby loves them
reviews.reviewText: She's picky when it comes to pacifiers but she loves these.

Excelentes, estos que son solo la orillita y no el chupón todo cerrado ayuda a evitar enrojecimiento por la saliva y malos olores. Los recomiendo mucho, son muy resistentes :)Mi bebé probó muchos chupones y ninguno lo aceptaba y está marca fue la única que si quiso 👍🏻
Me encantaron los chupones y a mí bebé también. Son sus favoritos. Es un poco complicado encontrar un clip para chupón con silicon, pero vale la pena.
Good quality and design as shown

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 10, 2017
reviews.reviewText: Little one loves them, help improve her sensitive skin too. And they have so cute illustrations.
Perfectos para bebés de más de 1 año.
